hierarchy.trajectory: CRITICAL ARCHITECTURAL INVESTIGATION: Time-stale filtering is meaningless without entity relationships. Investigating schema definitions, FK constraints, and relationship gaps across all entities.
hierarchy.tactic: Execute entity-relationship remediation master plan in strict order with evidence gates: Phase 0 baseline/cleanup first, then identity normalization, then FK backfill/hook isolation.
hierarchy.action: Updated docs/plans/2026-02-19-entity-relationship-remediation.md with Phase 2 Completion Record. Added 26 lines documenting implementation summary, exit gate evidence, and remaining Phase 3+ work.

summary: Phase 2 FK Remediation COMPLETED. MemNodeSchema.session_id FK added, all write paths updated, backfillMemSessionId() implemented. Exit gates passed: TypeScript errors=0, tests pass, code-review approved. Documentation updated. Ready for Phase 3.
